name: Castle Wars (RyTiex)
description:
JOIN DISCORD!
https://discord.gg/6C7xfWprRn

/---------------------

Player One:

W : Jump

A & D : Left & Right

F : Fire

G : Aim

E : Active Slow

R : Reload

Aim True:

W  & S : Look Up & Look Down

A & D : Look Left & Look Right

/-----------

Player Two:

Up Arrow : Jump

Left Arrow & Right Arrow : Left & Right

Enter : Fire

Shift : Aim

O : Active Slow

P : Reload

Aim True:

Up Arrow & Down Arrow : Look Up & Look Down

Left Arrow & Right Arrow :  Look Left &  Look Right

/-----------
